@version 0.2.0.0


module Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address

-- | Address.
data Address
Address :: String -> Integer -> Integer -> Address
[address] :: Address -> String
[unconfirmed_balance] :: Address -> Integer
[confirmed_balance] :: Address -> Integer

instance GHC.Generics.Selector Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.S1_0_1Address

instance GHC.Generics.Constructor Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.C1_0Address
instance GHC.Generics.Datatype Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.D1Address
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.Address

instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.FromJSON Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.Address
instance Data.Aeson.Types.Class.ToJSON Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Address.Address


module Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Transaction

-- | Input of a transaction.
data TransactionInput
TransactionInput :: String -> Integer -> Integer -> String -> String -> Integer -> TransactionInput
[prev_hash] :: TransactionInput -> String
[prev_index] :: TransactionInput -> Integer
[in_value] :: TransactionInput -> Integer
[in_script] :: TransactionInput -> String
[in_address] :: TransactionInput -> String
[sequence] :: TransactionInput -> Integer

-- | Output of a transaction.
data TransactionOutput
TransactionOutput :: Integer -> String -> String -> TransactionOutput
[out_value] :: TransactionOutput -> Integer
[out_script] :: TransactionOutput -> String
[out_address] :: TransactionOutput -> String

-- | Transaction.
data Transaction
Transaction :: String -> Int -> Int -> Integer -> Int -> UTCTime -> Int -> Int -> [TransactionInput] -> [TransactionOutput] -> Transaction
[tx_hash] :: Transaction -> String
[block_height] :: Transaction -> Int
[confirmed] :: Transaction -> Int
[fees] :: Transaction -> Integer
[size] :: Transaction -> Int
[received_date] :: Transaction -> UTCTime
[version] :: Transaction -> Int
[lock_time] :: Transaction -> Int
[inputs] :: Transaction -> [TransactionInput]
[outputs] :: Transaction -> [TransactionOutput]
instance GHC.Generics.Selector Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Transaction.S1_0_9Transaction

module Servant.ChainFlyer.Types.Block

-- | Block.
data Block
Block :: String -> Int -> Bool -> Int -> String -> String -> UTCTime -> Integer -> Integer -> Int -> Integer -> [String] -> Block
[block_hash] :: Block -> String
[height] :: Block -> Int
[is_main] :: Block -> Bool
[version] :: Block -> Int
[prev_block] :: Block -> String
[markle_root] :: Block -> String
[timestamp] :: Block -> UTCTime
[bits] :: Block -> Integer
[nonce] :: Block -> Integer
[txnum] :: Block -> Int
[total_fees] :: Block -> Integer
[tx_hashes] :: Block -> [String]

module Servant.ChainFlyer

-- | Common API root.
type BaseURL = "v1"

-- | ChainFlyer's all API
type ChainFlyerAPI = BlockAPI :<|> (BlockHeightAPI :<|> (LatestBlockAPI :<|> (TransactionAPI :<|> AddressAPI)))

-- | Proxy
chainFlyerAPI :: Proxy ChainFlyerAPI

-- | GET /block/:hash
type BlockAPI = BaseURL :> ("block" :> (Capture "hash" String :> Get '[JSON] Block))

-- | Proxy
blockAPI :: Proxy BlockAPI

-- | GET /block/height/:height
type BlockHeightAPI = BaseURL :> ("block" :> ("height" :> (Capture "height" Int :> Get '[JSON] Block)))

-- | Proxy
blockHeightAPI :: Proxy BlockHeightAPI

-- | GET /block/latest
type LatestBlockAPI = BaseURL :> ("block" :> ("latest" :> Get '[JSON] Block))

-- | Proxy
latestBlockAPI :: Proxy LatestBlockAPI

-- | GET /tx/:hash
type TransactionAPI = BaseURL :> ("tx" :> (Capture "hash" String :> Get '[JSON] Transaction))

-- | Proxy
transactionAPI :: Proxy TransactionAPI

-- | GET /address/:address
type AddressAPI = BaseURL :> ("address" :> (Capture "address" String :> Get '[JSON] Address))

-- | Proxy
addressAPI :: Proxy AddressAPI


module Servant.ChainFlyer.Client

-- | Servant client of <a>BlockAPI</a>
getBlock :: String -> EitherT ServantError IO Block

-- | Servant client of <a>BlockHeightAPI</a>
getBlockHeight :: Int -> EitherT ServantError IO Block

-- | Servant client of <a>LatestBlockAPI</a>
getLatestBlock :: EitherT ServantError IO Block

-- | Servant client of <a>TransactionAPI</a>
getTransaction :: String -> EitherT ServantError IO Transaction

-- | Servant client of <a>AddressAPI</a>
getAddress :: String -> EitherT ServantError IO Address
